Hi Pamela, 
-Scroll down to the answers to see one that discusses how one local government displays social media in real time during their meetings that they are also playing live on the internet so people can see the tweets being answered live. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/question/22372
-Your member may also find this past blog on "What Can Social Media Do For Me?" useful in determining ways in which local governments can engage with citizens in real time. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blogpost/1958/What_can_Social_Media_do_for_Me
Best,
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
